betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oNether bricks can be made in the hellfire forge!

§fNot only we can act within the universe. We can act on the universe.
The universe, or whoever or whatever force rules it, created those who can change it, who have the power to change it. In big and small ways. I ways that last and ways that do not. In ways that create and ways that destroy.
I can act upon the universe, I am free to act upn the universe.
And I am free to decide that I must act upon the universe!
